application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3b (Submission of details - external material for rear extension) of listed building consent 21/05029 (Alterations at rear including extension at lower ground level reaching to rear site boundary; extension at ground floor level; creation of green wall on rear boundary; replacement of window with door at first floor level to provide access to inset terrace. Alterations at front including installation of glazed fanlight and glazing bar, entrance light, house number and replacement of railings and gate with spear heads. Internal alterations including lowering at lower ground floor level and reconfiguration of layout)
